name: Handmade Adventure
description:
Hi! Are you ready to become the king of obstacles?

**** STAGE 3 RELEASED ****

Handmade adventure is a platform game that is different from today's standards. Are we going to have fun in this challenge?

**Characteristics:
- Easy gameplay to learn and improve;
- Game with medium difficulty upwards;
- Completely handmade game;
- Insane levels;
- Several obstacles with different difficulties;
- Various tasks;
- Several models of hats;
- Relaxing music (you will need it);

** Feedback:
- Your rating is very important for the game to be improved daily!

** IN-APP PURCHASES
- This game contains optional in-app purchases. You can disable this feature in your device's settings menu.
